text-node.description: General Import Component allows to specifiy folders and file patterns which are then imported with the appropriate system import

key-binding.alias: "StandardComponents-Import_" + CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('objectType')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('objectType') + ".xsd"
"StandardComponents-AfterProcessAction_" + CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('afterProcessAction')
(new dw.util.ArrayList())
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Import of " + FileForImport.getFullPath() + " successfully completed","INFO")

pipelet-node.custom-name: Filelist is assigned to a temporary variable. Current file in process is inserted into Filelist.

key-binding.alias: new dw.util.ArrayList(FileForImport)
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Import will not continue because of an error","INFO")

CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Import of " + FileForImport.getFullPath() + "failed (" + ErrorMsg + ") - see " + LogFileName + " for further information","ERROR", [(new dw.io.File(dw.io.File.IMPEX + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR +"log" + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR + LogFileName))])

CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Validation of " + FileForImport.getFullPath() + "failed - see " + LogFileName + " for further information","ERROR", [(new dw.io.File(dw.io.File.IMPEX + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR +"log" + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR + LogFileName))])

text-node.description: Validation logic is the same accross different imports - maybe move this into generic pipeline

key-binding.alias: CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Import of " + FileForImport.getFullPath() + "failed (" + ErrorMsg + ") - see " + LogFileName + " for further information","ERROR", [(new dw.io.File(dw.io.File.IMPEX + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR +"log" + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR + LogFileName))])

text-node.description: Copies files from a remote (s)ftp/WebDav-location to a local folder relatively to IMPEX/

key-binding.alias: new Object()
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Starting to download.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Download finished, " + ErrorMsg,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Download finished successfuly.", 'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("FTP-Download hasn't found any files to download", 'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Download finished, One or more mandatory parametrs are missing.",'ERROR')

text-node.description: Copies files from a a local folder relatively to IMPEX/ to a remote (s)ftp/WebDav-location

key-binding.alias: CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Starting to upload.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Upload finished, " + ErrorMsg,'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Upload finished successfuly.", 'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Upload finished, One or more mandatory parametrs are missing.",'ERROR')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Exception on Archiving","ERROR")
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Exception on Archiving","ERROR")

CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Import of " + FileForImport.getFullPath() + "failed (" + ErrorMsg + ") - see " + LogFileName + " for further information","ERROR", [(new dw.io.File(dw.io.File.IMPEX + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR +"log" + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR + LogFileName))])

CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Validation of " + FileForImport.getFullPath() + "failed - see " + LogFileName + " for further information","ERROR", [(new dw.io.File(dw.io.File.IMPEX + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR +"log" + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR + LogFileName))])

CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Import of " + FileForImport.getFullPath() + "failed (" + ErrorMsg + ") - see " + LogFileName + " for further information","ERROR", [(new dw.io.File(dw.io.File.IMPEX + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR +"log" + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR + LogFileName))])

CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Validation of " + FileForImport.getFullPath() + "failed - see " + LogFileName + " for further information","ERROR", [(new dw.io.File(dw.io.File.IMPEX + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR +"log" + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR + LogFileName))])

CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Import of " + FileForImport.getFullPath() + "failed (" + ErrorMsg + ") - see " + LogFileName + " for further information","ERROR", [(new dw.io.File(dw.io.File.IMPEX + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR +"log" + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR + LogFileName))])

CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Validation of " + FileForImport.getFullPath() + "failed - see " + LogFileName + " for further information","ERROR", [(new dw.io.File(dw.io.File.IMPEX + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR +"log" + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR + LogFileName))])

text-node.description: Move files which will not be archived to a temporary location.

key-binding.alias: (CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('DirectoriesToArchive')!=null&&CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('DirectoriesToArchive')!='')?CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('DirectoriesToArchive').split(','):new Array()

(CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('DirectoriesToPurge')!=null&&CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('DirectoriesToPurge')!='')?CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('DirectoriesToPurge').split(','):new Array()
!empty(CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('FilePattern')) ? CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('FilePattern') : '.*'
new dw.io.File("TEMP/DontArchiveTheseFiles")
new dw.io.File("TEMP/DontPurgeTheseFiles")
new dw.util.HashMap()
new dw.util.HashMap()

pipelet-node.custom-name: Add file list of current dir to map

key-binding.alias: DontArchiveFileMap.put(DirectoryToArchive, FileList)

pipelet-node.custom-name: Add file list of current dir to map

key-binding.alias: DontArchiveFileMap.put(DirectoryToPurge, FileList)

pipelet-node.custom-name: Init Itrators of moved files map

pipelet-node.description: Delete temp folders of files which not be archived or purged

key-binding.alias: CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Old files successfully removed/archived.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("An error occurred while removing/archiving old files.",'ERROR')

(CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('DirectoriesToArchive')!=null&&CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('DirectoriesToArchive')!='')?CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('DirectoriesToArchive').split(','):new Array()

(CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('DirectoriesToPurge')!=null&&CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('DirectoriesToPurge')!='')?CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.getParameterValue('DirectoriesToPurge').split(','):new Array()
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Old files successfully removed/archived.",'INFO')
CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("An error occurred while removing/archiving old files.",'ERROR')

text-node.description: Move moved files from their temporary location back to the source one.

key-binding.alias: CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("Import of " + FileForImport.getFullPath() + "failed (" + ErrorMsg + ") - see " + LogFileName + " for further information","ERROR", [(new dw.io.File(dw.io.File.IMPEX + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR +"log" + dw.io.File.SEPARATOR + LogFileName))])
